title: CLIENT SUCCESS MANAGERS
job_overview:
About Us:
We are a dynamic, forward-thinking media agency at the cutting edge of digital content creation. Our innovative approach has positioned us as leaders in producing viral content that resonates with audiences across platforms. As we continue to expand our creator network, we're seeking an exceptional Content Quality Manager to ensure our output maintains the impeccable standards our brand is known for.

We have a huge opportunity for a highly organized and assertive Client Success Manager who can effectively manage, coordinate, and quality-assure content creation with multiple creators.

This role goes beyond typical content management—it's an opportunity to define excellence in digital content creation. You'll develop invaluable skills in quality assurance, creator management, and visual storytelling to boost your career.

You'll also receive comprehensive training through access to our exclusive viral content program – a powerful toolkit trusted by industry professionals that reveals the exact strategies for transforming ordinary creators into internet sensations.

• Content Quality Assurance: Review all content submitted by creators, ensuring it meets our visual, technical, and brand standards. Provide direct feedback when content requires improvements, and request reshoots as needed.
• Scheduling and Coordination: Organize and maintain filming schedules with multiple creators, clearly communicating expectations and deadlines for each content piece.
• Assertive Communication: Maintain firm, professional communication with creators, confidently explaining quality standards and the need for reshoots when necessary.
• Continuous Follow-Up: Proactively remind and chase creators to meet filming schedules and re-shoot deadlines, ensuring timely content delivery that meets quality requirements.
• Logistics Management: Coordinate resources required for successful shoots, including locations, equipment, and any necessary teaUpgrade to see actual infombers.
• Administrative Support: Keep comprehensive records of all communication, scheduling, and content production activities to ensure smooth, continuous operations.

Requirements

This role requires a firm but supportive individual who understands what high-quality content looks like and is comfortable sending content back for reshoots when it does not meet our standards. With creators contacting you around the clock, the role demands dedication, flexibility, and a commitment to excellence in content quality. We are looking for someone with the following traits:

• Candidate must have native level English (C1 minimum): Can communicate well with international clients.
• Detail-Oriented and Quality-Focused: Able to spot even the smallest issues in content quality and insist on the highest standards, ensuring all content aligns with our brand.
• Firm and Confident Communicator: Comfortable giving constructive feedback and clearly explaining quality requirements, with the confidence to send content back to creators when necessary.
• Highly Organized: Skilled at managing multiple schedules and projects with strict deadlines and quality requirements.
• Self-Motivated and Dedicated: Demonstrates strong personal accountability, staying accessible and responsive, even outside of traditional working hours.
• Tech-Savvy: Experienced with tools such as Google Suite (Drive, Sheets, Docs) and project management software to organize, track, and review content.

Candidate Schedule:
Candidate will be required to work 6 days per week in a fully remote setup.

What the Company Offers
• Industry leading pay
• Fully remote position with the freedom to work from anywhere
• Clear career growth and the opportunity to become management for top performers.
• Opportunity to shape the quality standards of a growing digital content operation
• Chance to work with diverse, talented creators across multiple projects
• Flexible work environment
